name: @mashroom/mashroom-portal-demo-go-wasm-app
description: Simple Go/WebAssembly based app that integrates into the Mashroom Portal

scripts.dev: npm run build:go && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:go" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.build:go: GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o public/main.wasm ./src/go && cp wasm_exec.js public/go_wasm_exec.js && cp screenshot.png public
scripts.build: npm run build:go && npm run build:js

plugins.name: Mashroom Portal Demo Go WASM App
plugins.title: Demo Go WASM App

appConfig.message: This is simple Go/WASM based SPA that communicates with other Apps on the page via message bus
